about_the_game:
Drum Revolution - The game with which you can learn to play drums!


In Drum Revolution you can control a real platformer game with your e-drum kit or a rollup drumpad.

In the Drum Jumper mode, every drum and every cymbal - and all combinations thereof - causes a unique move of the character. This turns your drum kit or drumpad into your game controller. The different coloured platforms tell you which move you can use to climb them to get further and further up the level.
Our unique gameplay allows you to learn to play different grooves and fills in numerous levels without any notes at the beginning and with lots of fun.
Gradually, you will unlock your own personal drummer skill tree, which will give you a constant overview of the different levels and your learning progress, as well as where and how you can improve your drumming skills.

You'll learn to play your first rock hit in minutes and in just a few weeks you'll be playing drums as well as after months of music school lessons.

Drum Revolution - The Future of Learning to Drum!
